Title: Bounty Hunter Alt-Tab Guide by Godlike

ItemTooltips.phase_boots: You need to be able to chase heroes down. The extra damage is also great when coupled with Jinada.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Enables your team to take Roshan reasonably early and provides some nice auras. DO NOT get this first if your team is not killing Roshan with it.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Helpful mana regen and extra armor.
ItemTooltips.heart: If you have the money, grab a Heart after 1 or 2 damage items. BKB is still better against magic nukes though. Get a Heart instead only if they have more physical damage and/or little to no disables.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: It is very likely that you will be focused in fights first. Get a BKB so you don`t die.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: If you are going carry Bounty Hunter, MKB is very useful against evasion heroes. The damage increase is also great.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: You already have a guaranteed crit with Jinada and the 2 don`t stack if proc-ed at the same time.
ItemTooltips.bfury: Desolator is better in every regard. Battlefury is for the farming carries - you are a ganker. Don`t get this.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: The extra 150 damage is not multiplied by Jinada and you already have invisibility.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Jinada slows, Track makes you fast. Why do you need this?
ItemTooltips.desolator: The best damage item on Bounty Hunter - cheap, easy to build and the armor reduction increases your damage output by a lot.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Very helpful stats and makes chasing easier.

AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss: Get this after Jinada. Don`t use it right away in fights, try to wait and stop channeling abilities with its ministun. It costs a lot of mana so only max it first if you have plenty of mana regen items.
AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_jinada: Your bread and butter skill - increases your last hitting power and damage output, as well as slowing the enemy.
AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_wind_walk: Get this first in order to escape sticky situations.
AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_track: Even if you don`t get many last hits in lane, Track will let you catch up extremely quickly just by roaming the map and getting a kill here and there.
